languages.text: "А если кровавые знаки на твою семью укажут, ты их сможешь убить? Чего умолк, расхотелось в ткачи?"

traits.locale_text: "А если кровавые знаки на твою семью укажут, ты их сможешь убить? Чего умолк, расхотелось в ткачи?"

languages.text: "What if some blood omen points to your own family? Will you kill them? That's right, not as eager now, are you?"
languages.original_text: "А если кровавые знаки на твою семью укажут, ты их сможешь убить? Чего умолк, расхотелось в ткачи?"

traits.locale_text: "What if some blood omen points to your own family? Will you kill them? That's right, not as eager now, are you?"
"Do you think they have an opening for Most Cowardly Cultist of the Century?"
"What if some blood omen points to your own family? Will you kill them? That's right, not as eager now, are you?"
"Why? Do they have an opening for 'Most Cowardly Cultist of the Century?'"
"What if some blood omen points to your own family? Will you kill them? That's right, not as eager now, are you?"
"What if some blood omen points to your own family? Will you kill them? That's right, not as eager now, are you?"
"What if some blood omen points to your own family? Will you kill them? That's right, not as eager now, are you?"
"What if some blood omen points to your own family? Will you kill them? That's right, not as eager now, are you?"

languages.text: « Et si un présage de sang désignait votre propre famille, vous la tueriez quand même ? Alors, on n'est plus si pressé que ça d'accomplir Sa volonté, hein ? »
languages.original_text: "What if some blood omen points to your own family? Will you kill them? That's right, not as eager now, are you?"

traits.locale_text: « Et si un présage de sang désignait votre propre famille, vous la tueriez quand même ? Alors, on n'est plus si pressé que ça d'accomplir Sa volonté, hein ? »

languages.text: «¿Y si algún presagio de sangre pide la sangre de su propia familia? ¿Les mataría? Ya no veo ese entusiasmo de antes...».
languages.original_text: "What if some blood omen points to your own family? Will you kill them? That's right, not as eager now, are you?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Y si algún presagio de sangre pide la sangre de su propia familia? ¿Les mataría? Ya no veo ese entusiasmo de antes...».

languages.text: “万一他们所谓的什么‘预兆’选中了你的家人呢？你会不会老老实实杀了他们？你看，你现在可没那么信誓旦旦了，是吧？”
languages.original_text: "What if some blood omen points to your own family? Will you kill them? That's right, not as eager now, are you?"

traits.locale_text: “万一他们所谓的什么‘预兆’选中了你的家人呢？你会不会老老实实杀了他们？你看，你现在可没那么信誓旦旦了，是吧？”

languages.text: 「血のお告げが自分の家族を指していたらどうしますか？家族を殺しますか？ほら、もう熱心な気持ちはなくなってしまうでしょう？」
languages.original_text: "What if some blood omen points to your own family? Will you kill them? That's right, not as eager now, are you?"

traits.locale_text: 「血のお告げが自分の家族を指していたらどうしますか？家族を殺しますか？ほら、もう熱心な気持ちはなくなってしまうでしょう？」

languages.text: Was, wenn ein Blutomen Eure eigene Familie betrifft? Tötet Ihr sie dann? Genau, jetzt seid Ihr nicht mehr ganz so eifrig, was?
languages.original_text: "What if some blood omen points to your own family? Will you kill them? That's right, not as eager now, are you?"

traits.locale_text: Was, wenn ein Blutomen Eure eigene Familie betrifft? Tötet Ihr sie dann? Genau, jetzt seid Ihr nicht mehr ganz so eifrig, was?

languages.text: "Peki kanda okuduğun bir kehanet, aileni işaret etseydi? Onları öldürür müydün? Şimdi anladın. Hevesin kaçtı, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "What if some blood omen points to your own family? Will you kill them? That's right, not as eager now, are you?"
